thread.title: Soulja Boy Almost Throws Hands While Showing Off His Hood Cred On Instagram Live
thread.title_full: Soulja Boy Almost Throws Hands While Showing Off His Hood Cred On Instagram Live

author: Chris Mitchell
title: Soulja Boy Almost Throws Hands While Showing Off His Hood Cred On Instagram Live
text:
Soulja Boy Almost Throws Hands While Showing Off His Hood Cred On Instagram Live January 3, 2017 | 11:01 PM 0 
Soulja Boy took his Instagram followers on a live tour of Compton Tuesday night, with the intention of showing off how well-protected he is in light of his ongoing issues with Chris Brown , and for a second, it looked like the stunt was about to backfire on him. 
Soulja filmed himself roaming the streets with an assortment of locals he describes as Fruit Town Piru members, talking tough about catching fades at the top of his lungs as his entourage backs him up. 
‚ÄúThey say Soulja ain‚Äôt from the hood,‚Äù Soulja shouts as he throws his arm around one guy, who throws it right back while looking visibly annoyed. Then the phone drops, there‚Äôs some commotion, and someone picks it up and ends the recording. Shit went left when Soulja boy goes to the hood üò≥ pic.twitter.com/hAbOKYl3LC 
‚Äî Washed Biz (@WashedBiz) January 4, 2017 
The man in the video with Soulja appears to be the same one from a video Chris Brown shared previously, calling out Soulja for not being from the hood while surrounded by gun-wielding goons. Plot Twist‚Ä¶ the guy Soulja Boy tried to hug and got mushed was this guy w/ the smiley face on his shirt in this video Chris Brown posted pic.twitter.com/s5WAY3hkqM 
‚Äî DJ Akademiks (@IamAkademiks) January 4, 2017 
It was at that moment that the internet exploded with speculation that Soulja had just been jumped and had his phone stolen. 
Several rappers (and pretty much every rap fan on social media) reacted to the clip, including current nemesis Chris Brown, Waka Flocka Flame and Lil Durk, who did a not-so-dramatic reenactment of the scene.
